Description:
Unmatched Penthouse Living with almost 360 Degree Views!
Note: Inspections via private appointment only. Please register for a private viewing.
Enjoying a wonderful penthouse location on the 30th floor of the high end 'Forge' complex, this spacious, light-filled, and opulent 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is the pinnacle of luxurious Wharf's Entrance living with almost 360 degree views that are some of the best in Melbourne.
A shining jewel in one of the Dockland's most exclusive buildings, this immaculate and utterly sublime residence presents as new while enjoying high end fittings and fixtures as well as high ceilings which gives you a genuine feeling of spaciousness. The central living zone is as good as it gets when it comes to light, space, and views, with this area split into the dedicated dining area with curved windows which looks out to Port Phillip Bay, while the lounge also enjoys wonderful views to the west along with warming afternoon sun.
Separating the lounge and dining zones is the deluxe stone kitchen equipped with a waterfall island bench, soft-closing drawers, stainless steel Smeg appliances, and integrated Fisher & Paykel fridge and freezer. An enclosed balcony terrace with louvre windows has a brilliant northern orientation which allows for memorable views of the mountain ranges, Victoria Harbour, Marvel Stadium, and the CBD.
The master bedroom delivers ample BIRs and a pristine double vanity ensuite, while 2 other bedrooms with bay views have BIRs including one of these bedrooms which features a sizeable study space. Other penthouse extras include a stylish bathroom, separate laundry, ducted heating and cooling, secure video intercom, storage cage, and 2 secure car spaces.
Residents of the building also have access to a private dining room and cinema with cityscape views, state of the art health and well-being facility called the 'Wharf Club' which features a gym and pool, and a café overlooking the water as well as the Wharf's Landing Park. You're also positioned not far from South Wharf Promenade with a range of bars and restaurants, DFO shopping, Crown Casino, Port Melbourne and South Melbourne attractions, public transport, and Westgate Freeway.
